title: "dataset 2"
---


```{r, fig.width=10, fig.height=8}

summer_movies <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2024/2024-07-30/summer_movies.csv')

important_movies <- summer_movies |>
  select(runtime_minutes, year, average_rating) |>
  filter(year>1945, !is.na(year), !is.na(runtime_minutes), !is.na(average_rating))

important_movies
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data=important_movies, aes(x = runtime_minutes, y = year, color = average_rating)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(
    title = "Changes in Movie Runtime (1945-2024)",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Runtime (min)")
  
  
```
